name: Jaxi the Robot
description:
Jaxi the Robot is a programming game starring Jaxi, a robot you guide through challenges and obstacles using real Javascript.

Over the course of 50 levels, you will learn to write real Javascript, and help navigate Jaxi through many challenges.

The game has been specially designed and tested to ease people into programming, and excite and motivate them. As you progress, the programming challenges get tougher, while remaining fun and engaging. As you press forward, they will gain understanding of advanced concepts in programming.
